definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: The Yantai Muping area canal Junior middle school built in 1982.
sentences.chinese: 烟台市牟平区水道初级中学始建于1982年。

sentences.english: In junior high school the student may have a limited choice of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 在初级中学里，学生可以选修一些有限的课程。

sentences.english: But I study in a junior high school.
sentences.chinese: 但我在一个初级中学的。

sentences.english: Her daughter studies in the third grade in a junior high school.
sentences.chinese: 她的女儿在一所初级中学读三年级。

sentences.english: Our junior middle school was then badly off for teachers.
sentences.chinese: 当时我们初级中学缺少教师。

sentences.english: Muping area big kiln town Junior middle school located at Shandong Province.
sentences.chinese: 牟平区大窑镇初级中学位于山东省。

sentences.english: Excuse me, how can I get to Wujiang Experimental Junior Middle School?
sentences.chinese: 劳驾，吴江实验初级中学怎么走？

sentences.english: It is a junior middle school.
This phenomenon is particularly acute in rural junior middle schools.
sentences.chinese: 这一现象在农村初级中学尤为严重。

definition: senior high school/abbr. to 高中[gao1 zhong1]
lower elementary school (abbr. to 初小[chu1 xiao3])
vocational high school (abbr. to 職高|职高[zhi2 gao1])
secondary normal school (secondary school that trains kindergarten and elementary school teachers)
pinyin: zhong1 deng3 shi1 fan4 xue2 xiao4
zhong1 deng3 zhuan1 ye4 xue2 xiao4

definition: vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]
